title: Shreds of Humanity
description: At the fall of humanity, the world is violently divided between those who are still human and those who want to eat them. Shreds of Humanity is the story of a man who has lost his humanity, only to rediscover it in the scared eyes of a small girl. When one man is caught between what he was and what he has become, he must make a painful decision-Fight for what he once loved or devour what he now craves!
author: M.J. Hangge
